column2: AZEK Company Inc., formerly CPG Newco LLC., is a designer and manufacturer outdoor living products. The Companyâ€™s outdoor living products include deck, rail, trim and accessories. Its segments include Residential and Commercial. In its Residential segment, it designs, and manufacture engineered Outdoor Living products that includes deck, rail, trim and moulding and accessories. Decking manufacturers to offer both capped wood composite and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) decking products, and manufacturer to offer narrow and wide-width PVC deck boards. Commercial segment, it manufactures engineered sheet products and bathroom partitions and lockers. Commercial segment includes its Vycom and Scranton products product lines.
